items.sentence: Your French isn\'t good enough to get that job.
I suspect that Tom does that from time to time.
I suspect that Tom went to Boston last weekend.
Talking to Tom is like talking to a brick wall.
Tell Tom I grew up in Boston, just like he did.
Tell Tom I have to go to Boston for a few days.
I\'ll give you a call when I decide what to do.
I\'m not allowed to tell what you want to know.
As far as I know, Tom has never studied French.
As soon as I can afford to buy a house, I will.
Ask Tom where he wants you to put his suitcase.
I\'ve decided that I\'m going to shave my head.
I can\'t believe Tom made that kind of mistake.
Don\'t tell me you\'ve never been to Australia.
Why is Tom being so nice to me all of a sudden?
What\'s your favorite thing to have for supper?
What\'s your favorite way to exercise your dog?
I wonder whether Tom likes Chinese food or not.
Tom didn\'t believe what I told him about Mary.
You\'re a little taller than I am, aren\'t you?
